definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Women's Road Champion Sun Qingjing early Yuan was in this comprehension.

sentences.english: We live in a quiet street in the city of Kowloon.

sentences.english: It was still early when I returned home. The children were at school, my husband was at work and the house was quiet.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在上學，我丈夫在上班，家裏清靜得很。

sentences.english: Go to the priests, then, and leave philosophers in peace!

sentences.english: At home, his children recall, he prized the solitude of his lawnmower.

sentences.english: Here trees are luxuriantly green, green, green grass, quiet elegance.

sentences.english: I'll have a quiet day and I'll soon get better. " his wife told him.
sentences.chinese: 今天我將清靜一下了，我很快就會好點的。

sentences.english: It will calm your mind through meditation and self-questioning.
sentences.chinese: 通過冥想和自我探詢，將使你的頭腦感到清靜。

sentences.english: His house was situated in a very peaceful block in Moscow.

sentences.english: But I won't tweet , won't perturb you from the peace.
